title: Game crashes on match startup
body:
Logged into game ok. Client works. Messenger works. Pick your champion lobby works. But when I go to start the match (a bot game) all of my teammates images are blacked out if the loading screen loads at all. Then I get bugsplatted. I have tried reloading a dozen times now and all the same result.

Also, this would be my 2nd game in a row where I have to leave. Last night I had a power outage. That time was not my fault and neither is this. If you can solve the cause of my issue that would be great. But most importantly can you override leaver buster from activating on me? I am not purposely leaving games. These are issues out of my control and infrequent issues at that. I do NOT want to be penalized for disconnects I did not foresee happening prior to loading my game.

replies.body:
It sounds like League is having a particularly difficult time interacting with your hardware, specifically, your graphics card. Most of the time, these problems are caused by drivers or hardware issues, so I recommend working through our [bugsplat & crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the common solutions.

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your bugsplats.

I have tried logging back into the game I want to say 37 times now (not exaggerating). I have managed to get back into the game 2x. Those times I get into the game I can HEAR what is going on. But I do not SEE what is going on. Still a plain black screen and some laggy sound effects like an echo of the backing animation and an echo on the announcer saying "your team has destroyed an inhibitor." Maybe that will clarify what is wrong with my bug splats?
